attributes.action: Ban noisy fireworks and premote noiseless ones
attributes.additional_details:
Please ban the loud and noisy fireworks and allow the purchase of noiseless ones only. The mental health and safety of both public and animals makes this an important matter.
A member of my family who is an ex war vet gets triggered each and every year with more and more fireworks being set off. And they even do it as early as October instead of on Guy Fawkes Day. Then this continues up until after Christmas which is ridiculous as you can understand. There is a law no loud noise after 10pm.
attributes.background:
Remember, remember the 5th of November,
Gunpowder, treason and plot.
I see no reason
Why gunpowder treason
Should ever be forgot.
Every year this is great time to celebrate but also a very upsetting time for ex war vets and even our pets. Please swap to noiseless ones. They are also cheaper!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Make it illegal to sell, buy and use fireworks other than silent ones
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
